title: Jazz Moods - Feeling Sentimental (1999) [Jazz][mp3 30][h33t][sch
description:
Jazz Moods - Feeling Sentimental 
Original Release Date: November 9, 1999 
Audio CD; November 9, 1999 
Label: Concord Records 
Bitrate: 320 kbps

Jazz Moods: Feeling Sentimental collects reflective, romantic, and wistful jazz pieces featuring artists like Karrin Allyson, Jeff Linsky, Scott Hamilton, and Marian McPartland. Mel TormÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â©'s "It's Easy to Remember," Rosemary Clooney's "When October Goes," George Shearing's "My Favorite Things," and Stefan Scaggiari's "If I Could" are some of the highlights of this affordable collection of smoky, sentimental jazz. ~ Heather Phares, AMG

It's really a shame that there is no music sampler available for this collection as for others in the Jazz Moods series! Jazz lovers could then hear a nicely-melded collection of quiet, introspective music by such favorites as the incomparable Karrin Allyson, Marian McPartland and Scott Hamilton. "Sentimental" is not, I feel, an accurate description of this cd's overall mood. The songs are emotionally moving, especially Mary Stallings' gentle, soulful rendition of Clapton's "Tears in Heaven." An excellent styling by Rosemary Clooney of a Johnny Mercer/Barry Manalow "When October Goes" is not to be missed. Also, Stefan Scaggiari plays an unforgetable piano version of Pat Metheny's composition, "If I Could." Late nights, rainy days, solitary autumn afternoons - these are the times best suited for experiencing "Jazz Moods' Feeling Sentimental." ~ K. Rudd "authorfan"

Jazz Moods - Feeling Sentimental Tracks:
01 Karrin Allyson - Everything Must Change
02 Jeff Linsky - Murrieta's Farewell
03 Rosemary Clooney - When October Goes
04 Scott Hamilton - In a Sentimental Mood
05 Mel Tome - It's Easy to Remember-Adios
06 George Shearing - My Favorite Things
07 Carol Sloane - I'm Getting Sentimental over You
08 Herb Ellis & Remo Palmier - Danny Boy
09 Marian Stallings - Tears in Heaven
10 Marian McPartland - Long Ago And Far Away
11 Dennis Rowland - It Never Entered My Mind
12 Stefan Scaggiari - If I Could
